Default logger for logging within the module -

{% raw %}

get_default_logger[source]

get_default_logger(format=None, sink=None, level='DEBUG', filter=None, colorize=None, serialize=False, backtrace=True, diagnose=True, enqueue=False, catch=True)

create a loguru from format and log to sink

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
logger = get_default_logger()
logger.info("This is an INFO message !")
logger.debug("This is an DEBUG message !")
logger.warning("This is an WARNING message !")

INFO:__main__:This is an INFO message !
DEBUG:__main__:This is an DEBUG message !
WARNING:__main__:This is an WARNING message !
{% endraw %}

Plotting utilies to display a grid of Images -

{% raw %}

imshow_tensor[source]

imshow_tensor(inp, title=None, nrow:int=8, padding:int=2, normalize:bool=False, range:Optional[Tuple[int, int]]=None, scale_each:bool=False, pad_value:int=0)

Imshow for Tensor and optionally add a title

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Genrate a random-id , this can be used to track differenct experiments -

{% raw %}

generate_random_id[source]

generate_random_id()

generates a random id

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %} {% raw %} 
generate_random_id()

'0eb713be'
{% endraw %}
